name: part_006
file: tmp_【新曲あり！？】hololive IDOL PROJECTユニット初集合LIVE！ [FWXAnb08CPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: MC segment featuring Nakiri Ayame, Shirakami Fubuki, and Ookami Mio discussing their upcoming song.
Performance of the song 'Renjou Shika' by the unit 'Iroha ni Hololive'.

subtitles.original: なっておりますよね。
subtitles.english: It's become that way, hasn't it?

subtitles.original: どんな曲なのかな。
subtitles.english: I wonder what kind of song it is.

subtitles.original: ねえ、どんな、どんな、どんな曲なんでしょうねえ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I wonder what kind of song it'll be.

subtitles.original: 知ってるやろがい！このあとやるんだぞ！
subtitles.english: You know it already! We're performing it right after this!

subtitles.original: かわいい感じかな？
subtitles.english: Is it a cute kind of song?

subtitles.original: かわいい感じかな。やっぱね。
subtitles.english: Maybe it's a cute feel. Right?

subtitles.original: どんな感じかな。
subtitles.english: I wonder how it'll feel.

subtitles.original: 和風な感じ？和風。
subtitles.english: A Japanese style? Japanese.

subtitles.original: 和風でかわいい感じかな。どうかな？
subtitles.english: A Japanese and cute feel? I wonder?

subtitles.original: やりますかじゃあ。
subtitles.english: Shall we do it then?

subtitles.original: 聴いてみてからのお楽しみ。お楽しみ。
subtitles.english: Something to look forward to after you hear it.

subtitles.original: お楽しみ。
subtitles.english: Look forward to it.

subtitles.original: ではではではでは、最初位置覚えてますか？
subtitles.english: Now then, do you remember your starting positions?

subtitles.original: どうだったっけね。
subtitles.english: How was it again?

subtitles.original: やばいやばい。やばいやばい。
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no. Oh no, oh no.

subtitles.original: そうだ、こんな感じだったっけな。
subtitles.english: Right, I think it was something like this.

subtitles.original: そうです。ここですよ。ここですよもう。
subtitles.english: Yes. It's here. Right here.

subtitles.original: 忘れないで、歌詞も大丈夫かい？覚えてるかい？ちゃんと。
subtitles.english: Don't forget, are you okay with the lyrics too? Do you remember them?

subtitles.original: えっと、恋、情、詩、歌、入ってる。こんな感じだった。
subtitles.english: Umm, Renjou Shika... it's in there. It was like this.

subtitles.original: うわー、ちょっと二人ともちょっと不安になってきましたなあ。
subtitles.english: Whoa, I'm starting to get a bit worried about you two.

subtitles.original: まあでも行きましょうかね、じゃあね。
subtitles.english: Well, but let's go for it anyway.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: じゃあみんなで行きますよ、タイトル。それでは聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Let's all announce the title together. Now then, please listen.

subtitles.original: せーの。恋情詩歌！
subtitles.english: Ready? Renjou Shika!

subtitles.original:
恋情詩歌
作詞：藤村鼓乃美 (Hifumi,inc.)
作曲・編曲：板倉孝徳 (Hifumi,inc.)
subtitles.english:
Renjou Shika
Lyrics: Konomi Fujimura (Hifumi,inc.)
Composition/Arrangement: Takanori Itakura (Hifumi,inc.)

subtitles.original: 言えぬ言葉の数を数えてみては
subtitles.english: Counting the number of unspoken words

subtitles.original: (一、二、三、四、五、六、七、八と)
subtitles.english: (One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight)

subtitles.original: 小さなこの両手じゃ数えきれない
subtitles.english: These small hands cannot count them all

subtitles.original: 愛の唄が今も生まれて
subtitles.english: A song of love is being born even now

subtitles.original: 頭隠していても
subtitles.english: Even if I hide my head

subtitles.original: 角も尻尾も隠せない止められない
subtitles.english: I can't hide my horns or tail, I can't stop it

subtitles.original: 覗いては雲がくれ 乙女の恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: Peeking then hiding in the clouds, a maiden's love poem

subtitles.original: 気づかずに気がついてよ
subtitles.english: Notice me without even realizing it

subtitles.original: 秘め心は五月の闇
subtitles.english: The hidden heart is the darkness of May

subtitles.original: その向こうで舞い踊る
subtitles.english: Dancing beyond that

subtitles.original: 恋慕う君へと届くように
subtitles.english: Hoping it reaches you, whom I love

subtitles.original: みんな盛り上がってる！？最後までちゃんとついてくるんだよ！いくぞー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, are you hyped!? Follow us until the end! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 側で聞こえてしまう程鳴り響く
subtitles.english: It echoes so much it can be heard nearby

subtitles.original: (ドキドキッドキッドキッドキドキッドキッ)
subtitles.english: (Thump-thump, thump-thump...)

subtitles.original: 心塞いでも増すばかりで
subtitles.english: Even if I close my heart, it only increases

subtitles.original: クラクラする程の感情
subtitles.english: An emotion so strong it makes me dizzy

subtitles.original: 目線逸らしてみても
subtitles.english: Even if I turn my gaze away

subtitles.original: 角も尻尾も隠せない止められない
subtitles.english: I can't hide my horns or tail, I can't stop it

subtitles.original: 夢見ては雲超えて 乙女の恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: Dreaming and crossing clouds, a maiden's love poem

subtitles.original: 愛さずに愛しててよ
subtitles.english: Love me without even loving me

subtitles.original: 恋心は五月の闇
subtitles.english: The heart of love is the darkness of May

subtitles.original: その向こうに何を見る
subtitles.english: What do you see beyond that?

subtitles.original: 恋慕う君へと届くように
subtitles.english: Hoping it reaches you, whom I love

subtitles.original: 真心の鬼火そっと灯す
subtitles.english: Gently lighting the soul-fire of sincerity

subtitles.original: アイラブユウの数光らせば
subtitles.english: If I let the number of 'I love you's shine

subtitles.original: 化かしてあげましょうほら夢中
subtitles.english: I'll bewitch you, look, you're entranced

subtitles.original: 捧げるものなら辛口で
subtitles.english: If it's something to offer, let it be dry

subtitles.original: 高く声あげりゃあ集まれ
subtitles.english: If we raise our voices high, gather round

subtitles.original: どこに居たって遠く響かせ
subtitles.english: No matter where you are, let it echo far

subtitles.original: 物の怪乙女の三人衆
subtitles.english: The trio of monster maidens

subtitles.original: そこのけそこのけ我らが通る
subtitles.english: Out of the way, we're coming through

subtitles.original: 願えばいつかは晴れよと
subtitles.english: Hoping that one day it will clear up

subtitles.original: 闇に隠せし恋心
subtitles.english: A heart of love hidden in the darkness

subtitles.original: 雲の切れ間に明かり射す
subtitles.english: Light shines through the break in the clouds

subtitles.original: 今この時に
subtitles.english: In this moment right now

subtitles.original: 見つめれば隠してはおけない恋情詩歌
subtitles.english: Staring at it, I can't hide it, this love poem

subtitles.original: 触れないで抱き寄せてよ
subtitles.english: Don't touch me, just pull me close

subtitles.original: 素直になれたら五月の闇
subtitles.english: If I could be honest, the darkness of May

subtitles.original: 君だけに唄を歌おう
subtitles.english: I'll sing a song just for you
